Alcohol, Fructose, Bakuchiol, Xanthan Gum, Sclerotium Gum, Arachidyl Glucoside, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Sodium Phytate, Emblica Officinalis (Amla) Fruit Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Withania Somnifera Flower Extract, Caffeine, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Extract, Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola) Extract, Sodium Benzoate,
